_metadata.description: Trade history data based on 13F filings, capturing investment activities over several years. Each entry details transactions within specific quarters, including company involvement and the nature of the stock transaction.

schema.year: Array of years, with each year containing objects for quarterly activities.
schema.quarter: Represents the specific quarter and year of the recorded activities.
schema.activities: Array of objects, each describing a specific investment activity within the quarter.

activityDetails.transactionType: Type of transaction performed (e.g., Add, Sell, Buy, Reduce).
activityDetails.companyName: Full name of the company involved in the transaction.
activityDetails.stockTicker: The stock ticker symbol for the company.
activityDetails.shares: The total number of shares involved in the transaction, represented as an integer.
activityDetails.shareChangePercentage: The percentage change in the number of shares, related to the transaction, represented as a float.
activityDetails.portfolioChangePercentage: The impact of the transaction on the portfolio in percentage terms, represented as a float.
